Comment: It is hard to imagine even 6 months ago but China increasingly looks like the better bet.   Imagine two grocery stores: one always has its doors open, prices clearly marked, and deals honored no matter who walks in. The other sometimes changes prices without notice, rewrites the rules for certain customers, and occasionally pulls products off the shelf mid-transaction.   Who would you do business with?
Author: TubeframeMR2
